actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of correspondence to Members of the Congress free of postage, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits postage-free mailing of correspondence to any Member of Congress by residents of the State or district represented by such Member, providing such correspondence is sent to the Member's official business address.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of correspondence to Members of the Congress free of postage, and for other purposes.
